sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO process_events(status,env,process_logs,memo,type_class,context,execute_machine_ip, execute_machine_hash_range,gmt_create,gmt_modified,operator,hash_num,exec_count,process_instance_id,source, process_name,current_name,exec_start_time,is_delay_exec,process_number,syn_invoke)
VALUES (#status#,#env#,#processLogs#,#memo#,#typeClass#,#context#,#executeMachineIp#, #executeMachineHashRange#,now(),now(),#operator#,#hashNum#,#execCount#,#processInstanceId#,#source#, #processName#,#currentName#,now(),#isDelayExec#,#processorNumber#,#synInvoke#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE process_events
status = #status#
process_logs = #processLogs#
memo = #memo#
type_class = #typeClass#
context = #context#
execute_machine_ip = #executeMachineIp#
execute_machine_hash_range = #executeMachineHashRange#
gmt_modified = now()
operator = #operator#
hash_num = #hashNum#
exec_count = #execCount#
process_instance_id = #processInstanceId#
source = #source#
process_name = #processName#
current_name = #currentName#
exec_start_time = now()
is_delay_exec = #isDelayExec#
process_number = #processorNumber#
syn_invoke= #synInvoke#
WHERE id = #id#
UPDATE process_events SET status = #to# where status =#from# AND hash_num<=10000
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
FROM process_events WHERE id = #id# AND hash_num =#hashNum# group by hash_num

SELECT
FROM process_events WHERE
hash_num >= #start# AND hash_num<= #end# AND env = #env# AND process_number = #processorNumber# AND status = 0 AND syn_invoke = 0 order by gmt_modified asc limit #count#
SELECT count(*) FROM process_events WHERE status = 0
